game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has lost all meaning, the fabric of reality is unraveling. Players take on the role of a Chronos, tasked with restoring order to the timestream. As they journey through forgotten eras, they discover that an ancient being known only as 'The Devourer' is responsible for the distortions.
game.beginning: Players awaken in the ruins of a long-lost city, where they meet their enigmatic guide, Astra. Together, they embark on a quest to reach the Heart of Time, a mysterious artifact rumored to hold the secrets of the timestream.
game.ending: With The Devourer defeated and the timestream restored, players return to their own time. However, as they look back at the journey they undertook, they realize that their actions have created a new timeline, raising questions about the nature of fate and the consequences of altering history.
